Configuration.Name: L1=L2=8m_central_apx12p5_VS
Configuration.SetupScript: sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 25477') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5.55') #config.wavelength = 5 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 7200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g3' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 88.5765 config.beamcenterz = 95.6671 config.drive()
